meanings.definition: A lichen that grows on trees and rocks.
meanings.sent1: The usneas on the tree looked like a tiny forest.
meanings.sent2: The usneas added a touch of green to the rocky landscape.
meanings.sent3: The usneas whispered secrets to the passing breeze.
meanings.sent4: The usneas spread like a soft blanket over the rough bark.
meanings.sent5: The usneas painted a picture of tranquility on the old oak tree.

meanings.definition: The state of being covered in lichen.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins showed signs of usneas covering every surface.
meanings.sent2: The usneas gave the forest a mystical appearance.
meanings.sent3: The usneas party on the rocks was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The usneas invasion turned the landscape into a green wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The usneas takeover transformed the area into a lichen paradise.

meanings.sent1: The old statue usneased over time, blending with nature.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house usneased until it was barely recognizable.
meanings.sent3: The car usneased with lichen, camouflaging it in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The boulder usneased slowly, becoming part of the rocky hillside.
meanings.sent5: The fence post usneased under the weight of the creeping lichen.
